name: GET BACK
description:
Get Back is a two-player cooperative survival game where players are trapped in a dungeon and must escape a set amount of rooms in order to win. Player 1 is a witch that can collect monster parts to brew a healing potion, and player 2 is a monster hunter that can attack and defend. As of now, there are two monster types.

  • 2 Player cooperative survival game 
  • Collect monster parts to brew healing potions
  • Slay monsters and defend your witch!
  • Advance towards the next room and escape the dungeon!

- DEVELOPERS -
Ina Sablan
Max Cavun

- CREDITS -

Design: Ina Sablan and Max Cavun

Art: Ina Sablan and Max Cavun
